Title: Xbox and Crocs launch exclusive gaming-inspired clogs

Game-mode: enabled. Xbox and Crocs have teamed up to release an exclusive collection.

Ready up with this controller-meets-clog design that reimagines the iconic Xbox controller with fixed buttons and joysticks into the perfect shoe for couch co-op and kicking back – complete with cushioned footbeds adorned with Player Left and Player Right, which give expert-level comfort to support your next session.

![](https://xboxwire.thesourcemediaassets.com/sites/2/2025/11/Crocs-Wire-Asset_3-ba2346ed57666469191a-1900x1080.jpg)

Available on the [Crocs website](https://www.crocs.com/c/collections/xbox) starting tomorrow, the limited-edition Xbox collection includes a 5-pack of Xbox + Jibbitz charms featuring fan-favorite characters and icons from Halo, Fallout, DOOM, *World of Warcraft*, and *Sea of Thieves*.

![](https://xboxwire.thesourcemediaassets.com/sites/2/2025/11/Crocs-Wire-Asset_4-dd146a2fdb2f0ed5e842-1024x576.jpg) ![](https://xboxwire.thesourcemediaassets.com/sites/2/2025/11/Crocs-Wire-Asset_6-eb01be7fd7c982168f71-1024x576.jpg) ![](https://xboxwire.thesourcemediaassets.com/sites/2/2025/11/Crocs-Wire-Asset_7-c81d1ff29a6360cfc121-1024x576.jpg) ![](https://xboxwire.thesourcemediaassets.com/sites/2/2025/11/Crocs-Wire-Asset_5-068ad4efcbf2be0ec4d9-1024x576.jpg) ![](https://xboxwire.thesourcemediaassets.com/sites/2/2025/11/Crocs-Wire-Asset_8-cb3225a9bbee4035b6cf-1024x576.jpg) ![](https://xboxwire.thesourcemediaassets.com/sites/2/2025/11/Crocs-Wire-Asset_2-a66a131dedb937ad0374-1024x576.jpg) ![](https://xboxwire.thesourcemediaassets.com/sites/2/2025/11/Crocs-Wire-Asset_1-4c32f5a28d531a81d976-1024x576.jpg)

No matter how you choose to play, or where your holiday plans take you – the iconic Xbox controller-inspired clog will be with you along every step of the fun.
